amendment.description: Amendment allows participating eligible entities to apply to expand their approved projects beyond the 3,000 student maximum (up to 5,000) if the past two evaluations warrant such expansion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 113-546 to allow participating eligible entities to apply to expand their approved projects beyond the 3,000 student maximum if the past two evaluations warrant such expansion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Walberg.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
